Metadata.Title: Unused Services Are Disabled
Metadata.Priority: J.D. Meier, Alex Mackman, Michael Dunner, Srinath Vasireddy, Ray Escamilla and Anandha Murukan

Content.Data:
What to Check For

Check to ensure that all unused services are disabled. Also make sure that Trivial File Transfer Protocol (TFTP) is disabled, Internet-facing administration points are removed, and ACLs configured to limit administrative access.

Adapted from Microsoft patterns & practices guidance.
